title: Hurricane Irene: ‘Photo’ of shark swimming in street is fake
text: By Sarah Anne Hughes That’s because it is. Google "shark," and up pops a great photo of a shark stalking a kayak from a 2005 issue of Africa Geographic .. Commenters on Reddit, where the photo seems to have originated, quickly noted this and the very real similarities between the two sharks (note the small circular shadow just below the shark's belly.)
